Disney could have honored what people loved about the hope and glass-half-full characteristics of Luke vs. throwing him away as a cranky loser. Taking it one step further - it's as though Disney goes out of its way to disavow that Luke is the entire linchpin in Star Wars - they want you to believe he is \"just another character\" so you can stop investing in him to move on to Rey and team\, If the story had shown that Luke was invested in Rey and the cause (even if he would have died)\, then fans would have been invested in Rey and the cause.
